åŒåŸ‹å·´æ‰“ä½ å¹³æ—¥æ”¾å­¸æ™‚é–“æœƒå””æœƒæ•™äºº

Peter said "Susannah hasn't done her grade eight piano exam." His elder brother said "Neither have I." His younger brother said "Nor have I." His elder sister said "I haven't either." His younger sister said "Me neither." His cousin said "She hasn't done the grade eight practical exam, neither has she taken the theory exam." His mother said "She hasn't taken the practical exam, nor has she done the theory exam." His father said "Celine didn't go to the concert and Tommy didn't either." His uncle said "You're right. Neither Celine nor Tommy attended the concert." Peter is a kickboxing fan. Peter said "In the first match, Dan didn't punch nor kick his opponent; he got knocked out in the first ten seconds. In the second match, Dan neither won nor lost; it was a draw."

replies.msg: é›é¤…not my cup of tea
Joey Yung held a masterclass last Tuesday. I didn't attend her masterclass as I got work to do, neither did I go to her concert. Neither I, Andy Lau nor Leon Lai attended her masterclass and concert.

Leon Lai is a WWE fan. He said "In his first match against John Cena, Kane landed neither a jab nor a cross on his opponent's face; he got knocked out in the first twenty seconds of the first round. In his second match against Cena, he didn't win nor lose; it was a draw."
